chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Sashalle Anderly, p. 73 (72)—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. She was stilled by Rand during the battle at Dumai's Wells. She has since been Healed by Damer Flinn, and is now an apprentice of the Wise Ones and oathsworn to Rand. She even wears Aiel jewelry.
